bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Cinnamon crashes after last update to given NVR.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
libgnomekbd-3.21.92-1.fc25
How reproducible:
100%, install update and try to login into Cinnamon DE.
Actual results:
Cinnamon crashes into fallback mode, because of missing scheme: org.gnome.libgnomekbd.desktop
Expected results:
Cinnamon starts without crash.
Additional info:
released libgnomekbd-3.22.0.1 reintroduces the missing scheme.
Solution:
Please build and push update for latest release.
